entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:29 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 06:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
